issue.title: Refactor Bootstrap to use static constructors
issue.body:
Currently the Bootstrap object uses a public constructor with a relatively large amount of dependencies, all of them optional. For most out-of-the-box use cases there's only 1 or 2 of these that are typically necessary to provide. Having 1 constructor is not intuitive when you'd want to override dependencies and makes bootstrapping clunkier than it has to be.

In 3.0 a series of static constructor methods should be created that will satisfy common bootstrapping scenarios without always having to be exposed to the full complexity of bootstrapping.
